message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable, don't you think?
I understand you want a larger share Alice, but I need a bit more than that. How about we meet closer to the middle?
Bob, time is money, literally! This is my final offer in this range. Take it or I'll have to aim even higher in the next round.
Alice, your offer is getting lower. I'm willing to be flexible, but this needs to be a bit more balanced.
